item.title: [RENAMED]100% Transparent Context Menus
item.dc:creator: @mod_cody mod cody
item.description:
@mod_cody wrote:

And yes this IS Transparent!

Base: MITB, Galkons Enhanced 3.1

Replace:

private void drawMenu() { int i = menuOffsetX; int j = menuOffsetY; int k = menuWidth; int j1 = super.mouseX; int k1 = super.mouseY; int l = menuHeight + 1; int i1 = 0x5d5447; if(menuScreenArea == 0) { j1 -= 4; k1 -= 4; } if(menuScreenArea == 1) { j1 -= 519; k1 -= 168; } if(menuScreenArea == 2) { j1 -= 17; k1 -= 338; } if(menuScreenArea == 3) { j1 -= 515; k1 -= 0; } DrawingArea.method338(j + 2, l - 4, 250, 0x706a5e, k, i); DrawingArea.method338(j + 1, l - 2, 250, 0x706a5e, k - 2, i + 1); DrawingArea.method338(j, l, 200, 0x706a5e, k - 4, i + 2); DrawingArea.method338(j + 1, l - 2, 250, 0x2d2822, k - 6, i + 3); DrawingArea.method338(j + 2, l - 4, 250, 0x2d2822, k - 4, i + 2); DrawingArea.method338(j + 3, l - 6, 250, 0x2d2822, k - 2, i + 1); DrawingArea.method338(j + 19, l - 22, 250, 0x524a3d, k - 4, i + 2); DrawingArea.method338(j + 20, l - 22, 250, 0x524a3d, k - 6, i + 3); DrawingArea.method335(0x112329, j + 20, k - 6, l - 23, 230, i + 3); DrawingArea.fillPixels(i + 3, k - 6, 1, 0x2a291b, j + 2); DrawingArea.fillPixels(i + 2, k - 4, 1, 0x2a261b, j + 3); DrawingArea.fillPixels(i + 2, k - 4, 1, 0x252116, j + 4); DrawingArea.fillPixels(i + 2, k - 4, 1, 0x211e15, j + 5); DrawingArea.fillPixels(i + 2, k - 4, 1, 0x1e1b12, j + 6); DrawingArea.fillPixels(i + 2, k - 4, 1, 0x1a170e, j + 7); DrawingArea.fillPixels(i + 2, k - 4, 2, 0x15120b, j + 8); DrawingArea.fillPixels(i + 2, k - 4, 1, 0x100d08, j + 10); DrawingArea.fillPixels(i + 2, k - 4, 1, 0x090a04, j + 11); DrawingArea.fillPixels(i + 2, k - 4, 1, 0x080703, j + 12); DrawingArea.fillPixels(i + 2, k - 4, 1, 0x090a04, j + 13); DrawingArea.fillPixels(i + 2, k - 4, 1, 0x070802, j + 14); DrawingArea.fillPixels(i + 2, k - 4, 1, 0x090a04, j + 15); DrawingArea.fillPixels(i + 2, k - 4, 1, 0x070802, j + 16); DrawingArea.fillPixels(i + 2, k - 4, 1, 0x090a04, j + 17); DrawingArea.fillPixels(i + 2, k - 4, 1, 0x2a291b, j + 18); DrawingArea.fillPixels(i + 3, k - 6, 1, 0x564943, j + 19); chatTextDrawingArea.method385(i1, "Choose Option", j + 14, i + 3); for(int l1 = 0; l1 < menuActionRow; l1++) { int i2 = j + 31 + (menuActionRow - 1 - l1) * 15; int j2 = 0xc6b895; if (j1 > i && j1 < i + k && k1 > i2 - 13 && k1 < i2 + 3) { DrawingArea.drawPixels(15, i2 - 11, i + 3, 0x26566C, menuWidth - 6); j2 = 0xeee5c6; } chatTextDrawingArea.method389(true, i + 4, 0xAAA184, menuActionName[l1], i2 + 1); } }

To change the Opacity find

DrawingArea.method335(0x112329, j + 20, k - 6, l - 23, [COLOR="Red"]230[/COLOR], i + 3);

Replace the red number
0 = completely transparent

300 = more solid

1000 = RAINBOWS!

Higher the number = more solid
Lower the number = more transparent

Credits to who ever originally made this and me for simple fix

Please don’t flame, I know this has been released before but every single tutorial or snippet I find didn’t help me one bit. This is for those who are having issues

I am Google411 from rs
